cleaned_text: Due to the end of the COVID-19 emergency health response, our response guidelines follow normal procedures as per any infectious disease, such as influenza. TESTING COVID testing is available for patients with COVID symptoms. Tests must be ordered by a provider in a clinic, urgent care, or emergency department setting. VACCINE The Bivalent COVID vaccine is available at our Mille Lacs Heath System Community Pharmacies in Onamia & Isle. Vaccine pharmacy hours: Monday - Friday 9:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. & 1:00 p.m. - 5:00 p.m. Saturday & Sunday 9:00 a.m. - 12:00 p.m. (Isle closed on Sunday) Patients can also request the vaccine/booster at regular clinic appointments. VISITOR POLICY We welcome visitors! Before you visit a patient's room, please check with staff to determine: If you have cold-like or COVID symptoms, or have tested positive for COVID-19, we ask that you not visit until you have recovered. Masking Masks are not required in the facility at this time. Visit the Minnesota Department of Health's COVID page for the latest news & updates. [Coronavirus Disease 2019 (COVID-19) - MN
